worklogs.comment:
nealrichardson commented on pull request #6901: ARROW-6439: [R] Implement S3 file-system interface in R
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6901
 
 
   So far this is mostly just the foundational work to conditionally build the S3 bindings if the C++ library was built with ARROW_S3=ON. The package compiles; the test is correctly skipped if it is not enabled; and the test segfaults if S3 is on.

nealrichardson commented on pull request #6901: ARROW-6439: [R] Implement S3 file-system interface in R
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6901#discussion_r409834424
 
 

 ##########
 File path: r/tests/testthat/test-filesystem.R
 ##########
 @@ -122,3 +123,17 @@ test_that("LocalFileSystem + Selector", {
   expect_equal(sum(types == FileType$File), 2L)
   expect_equal(sum(types == FileType$Directory), 1L)
 })
+
+test_that("FileSystem$from_uri", {
+  skip_on_cran()
+  skip_if_not_available("s3")
+  fs_and_path <- FileSystem$from_uri("s3://ursa-labs-taxi-data")
 
 Review comment:
   Does it work with a bucket that doesn't exist? I actually didn't try. 
   
   We already talk about the `ursa-labs-taxi-data` bucket in `r/vignettes/dataset.Rmd`, so the presence of the bucket is already "depended on".

nealrichardson commented on pull request #6901: ARROW-6439: [R] Implement S3 file-system interface in R
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6901#discussion_r409899306
 
 

 ##########
 File path: ci/scripts/r_test.sh

 @@ -42,6 +42,7 @@ export _R_CHECK_TESTS_NLINES_=0
 export _R_CHECK_CRAN_INCOMING_REMOTE_=FALSE
 export _R_CHECK_LIMIT_CORES_=FALSE
 export VERSION=$(grep ^Version DESCRIPTION | sed s/Version:\ //)
+export AWS_EC2_METADATA_DISABLED=TRUE
 
 Review comment:
   ```suggestion
   # By default, aws-sdk tries to contact a non-existing local ip host
   # to retrieve metadata. Disable this so that S3FileSystem tests run faster.
   export AWS_EC2_METADATA_DISABLED=TRUE
   ```

   ```suggestion
   # By default, aws-sdk tries to contact a non-existing local ip host
   ```

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

fields.summary: [R] Implement S3 file-system interface in R

comments.body: aws-sdk-cpp isn't going to be available on Windows (cf. https://github.com/r-windows/rtools-packages/pull/37), so we'll need to make sure that this feature is flagged based on whether the C++ library has been built with {{ARROW_S3}} on.
This is ready to start now.
